name: Revival of the Road
description:
The first Russian game project with a real city - Astrakhan. Always dreamed of going to their native places right in the game? To run, to jump - to drive, to drive?
Well .. Welcome! - You have an exact copy of the city!

In this game you will find a completely open game world - go wherever you want! A lot of different cars, from AvtoVaza to Mercedes , tuning system, the system of races, races.

By the way .. The most interesting cars are hidden all over the city - will you find it? They are yours!
